channel.title: Having Trouble With Run.bat! please enter plz enter!
channel.description: hi...When i open my run.bat it comes up with message.... 'java' is not recongiszed as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file'... ive got the JDK's that are told to get... if u hav any info on how to fix this plz reply, thanks! :)

item.title: Having Trouble With Run.bat! please enter plz enter!
item.dc:creator: @r4ng3_xx r4ng3 xx
item.description:
@r4ng3_xx wrote:

wat do u suggest i do?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 05:34:44 AM[/size][hr]i think theres somthing wrong with… ‘’’’‘Java’’’’’ -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause [br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 05:38:00 AM[/size][hr]OMG YES!!! i fixed it my self! it was bout CLASSPATH and PATH w00t!

Read full topic

item.title: Having Trouble With Run.bat! please enter plz enter!
item.dc:creator: @r4ng3_xx r4ng3 xx
item.description:
@r4ng3_xx wrote:

@echo off
title Runserver
set Java= C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\Java.exe
Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause [br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 05:19:26 AM[/size][hr]i downloaded jdk1.6.0_02 b4… and replaced jdk1.6.0 to jdk1.6.0_02[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 05:27:58 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Called enzo, post:4, topic:129517”]Paste ur runserver code here

Right click = Edit :D[/quote] @echo off
title Runserver
set Java= C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\Java.exe
Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause [br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 05:32:47 AM[/size][hr]lol =]
